languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, мы прибыли в систему Фтона-IV. Выход из варпа прошел с осложнениями, на средних и технических палубах порядка пяти сотен чистыми потерями, еще Бог-Император знает сколько раненых. Но это полбеды: голованы с авгуров шлют отчеты, которые меня совсем не радуют. Реальный мир тут дырявый как решето: по всем направлениям приборы дурят, без колдовства тут не обошлось".

"Lord Cap'n, we have arrived in Phton IV's system. Our translation from the warp was a little rough — a net loss of about 500 souls on the middle and service decks, and God-Emperor only knows how many wounded. But that's only the half of it: the brainboxes on the augurs are sending me reports that aren't doing my mood any favours. Realspace here's got more holes than a sieve, and all our sensors are playing up — it's got to be sorcery, Lord Cap'n."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, мы прибыли в систему Фтона-IV. Выход из варпа прошел с осложнениями, на средних и технических палубах порядка пяти сотен чистыми потерями, еще Бог-Император знает сколько раненых. Но это полбеды: голованы с авгуров шлют отчеты, которые меня совсем не радуют. Реальный мир тут дырявый как решето: по всем направлениям приборы дурят, без колдовства тут не обошлось".

Realspace here's got more holes than a sieve, and all our sensors are playing up — it's got to be sorcery, Lord Cap'n."

But that's only the half of it: the brainboxes on the augurs are sending me reports that aren't doing my mood any favours. Realspace here's got more holes than a sieve, and all our sensors are playing up — it's got to be sorcery, Lord Cap'n."

languages.text: “船长老大，菲顿四号星已经到了。从亚空间出来这段路不太顺，中层甲板和服务甲板大概死了五百个人，至于多少人受伤，恐怕只有神皇才知道了。但坏消息还没完，俄歇矩阵的扫描结果让我看着相当头疼。这片真实世界的空间里到处都是洞，像筛子一样，我们所有的传感器都失灵了。这肯定是巫术搞的鬼，船长老大。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, we have arrived in Phton IV's system. Our translation from the warp was a little rough — a net loss of about 500 souls on the middle and service decks, and God-Emperor only knows how many wounded. But that's only the half of it: the brainboxes on the augurs are sending me reports that aren't doing my mood any favours. Realspace here's got more holes than a sieve, and all our sensors are playing up — it's got to be sorcery, Lord Cap'n."

traits.locale_text: “船长老大，菲顿四号星已经到了。从亚空间出来这段路不太顺，中层甲板和服务甲板大概死了五百个人，至于多少人受伤，恐怕只有神皇才知道了。但坏消息还没完，俄歇矩阵的扫描结果让我看着相当头疼。这片真实世界的空间里到处都是洞，像筛子一样，我们所有的传感器都失灵了。这肯定是巫术搞的鬼，船长老大。”

languages.text: «Lord Capi, hemos llegado al sistema de Phton IV. La transición del vacío no ha sido del todo limpia: hemos perdido unas 500 almas en las cubiertas intermedias y de servicio, y el Dios Emperador sabe cuántos heridos tenemos. Pero eso no es todo: los cerebritos de los augures me envían informes de los malos. El espacio real por esta región tiene más agujeros que un colador, y todos nuestros sensores se están volviendo locos. Tiene que ser hechicería, Lord Capi».
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, we have arrived in Phton IV's system. Our translation from the warp was a little rough — a net loss of about 500 souls on the middle and service decks, and God-Emperor only knows how many wounded. But that's only the half of it: the brainboxes on the augurs are sending me reports that aren't doing my mood any favours. Realspace here's got more holes than a sieve, and all our sensors are playing up — it's got to be sorcery, Lord Cap'n."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capi, hemos llegado al sistema de Phton IV. La transición del vacío no ha sido del todo limpia: hemos perdido unas 500 almas en las cubiertas intermedias y de servicio, y el Dios Emperador sabe cuántos heridos tenemos. Pero eso no es todo: los cerebritos de los augures me envían informes de los malos. El espacio real por esta región tiene más agujeros que un colador, y todos nuestros sensores se están volviendo locos. Tiene que ser hechicería, Lord Capi».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、プトン・IV星系に到着しました。ワープからの移行は少し荒いものでした。中層デッキとサービスデッキで約500名の命が失われ、負傷者の数は神帝陛下しか知り得ません。しかし、それでも半分にすぎません。スキャナーのブレインボックスが、我の気分転換には何の役にも立たないレポートを送ってくるんです。このリアルスペースにはふるいよりも多くの穴があり、我らのセンサーはフル稼働しています…これは魔術に違いありません、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, we have arrived in Phton IV's system. Our translation from the warp was a little rough — a net loss of about 500 souls on the middle and service decks, and God-Emperor only knows how many wounded. But that's only the half of it: the brainboxes on the augurs are sending me reports that aren't doing my mood any favours. Realspace here's got more holes than a sieve, and all our sensors are playing up — it's got to be sorcery, Lord Cap'n."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、プトン・IV星系に到着しました。ワープからの移行は少し荒いものでした。中層デッキとサービスデッキで約500名の命が失われ、負傷者の数は神帝陛下しか知り得ません。しかし、それでも半分にすぎません。スキャナーのブレインボックスが、我の気分転換には何の役にも立たないレポートを送ってくるんです。このリアルスペースにはふるいよりも多くの穴があり、我らのセンサーはフル稼働しています…これは魔術に違いありません、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, on est arrivés dans le système de Phton-IV. Notre transition depuis le Warp a été un peu rude : une perte nette de 500 âmes sur les ponts intermédiaires et de service, et l'Empereur-Dieu sait combien de blessés. Mais c'est pas tout : l'équipe des augures m'envoie des rapports qui font rien pour me remonter le moral. Ici, l'espace réel est plus troué qu'une passoire et nos capteurs s'affolent. C'est sûrement de la sorcellerie, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, we have arrived in Phton IV's system. Our translation from the warp was a little rough — a net loss of about 500 souls on the middle and service decks, and God-Emperor only knows how many wounded. But that's only the half of it: the brainboxes on the augurs are sending me reports that aren't doing my mood any favours. Realspace here's got more holes than a sieve, and all our sensors are playing up — it's got to be sorcery, Lord Cap'n."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, on est arrivés dans le système de Phton-IV. Notre transition depuis le Warp a été un peu rude : une perte nette de 500 âmes sur les ponts intermédiaires et de service, et l'Empereur-Dieu sait combien de blessés. Mais c'est pas tout : l'équipe des augures m'envoie des rapports qui font rien pour me remonter le moral. Ici, l'espace est plus troué qu'une passoire et nos capteurs s'affolent. C'est sûrement de la sorcellerie, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: "Lord Cap'n, wir sind im System von Phton IV eingetroffen. Unser Übertritt aus dem Warp war ein wenig unsanft – der Nettoverlust auf den mittleren und Servicedecks beträgt etwa 500 Seelen, und nur der Gottimperator weiß, wie viele Verwundete. Aber das ist noch nicht alles: Die Gehirnboxen der Auguren senden Berichte, die meine Laune nicht gerade heben. Der Realraum hat mehr Löcher als ein Sieb, und alle unsere Sensoren spielen verrückt – das muss Hexerei sein, Lord Cap'n."
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, we have arrived in Phton IV's system. Our translation from the warp was a little rough — a net loss of about 500 souls on the middle and service decks, and God-Emperor only knows how many wounded. But that's only the half of it: the brainboxes on the augurs are sending me reports that aren't doing my mood any favours. Realspace here's got more holes than a sieve, and all our sensors are playing up — it's got to be sorcery, Lord Cap'n."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Cap'n, wir sind im System von Phton IV eingetroffen. Unser Übertritt aus dem Warp war ein wenig unsanft – der Nettoverlust auf den mittleren und Servicedecks beträgt etwa 500 Seelen, und nur der Gottimperator weiß, wie viele Verwundete. Aber das ist noch nicht alles: Die Gehirnboxen der Auguren senden Berichte, die meine Laune nicht gerade heben. Der Realraum hat mehr Löcher als ein Sieb, und alle unsere Sensoren spielen verrückt – das muss Hexerei sein, Lord Cap'n."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Phton IV sistemine ulaştık. Öteboyuttan geçişimiz biraz sıkıntılı oldu, orta güverte ile ve hizmet güvertelerindeki net kaybımız yaklaşık 500 kişi. Kaç yaralımız var yalnız Tanrı İmparator bilir. Hepsi bu kadar da değil: Alametlerdeki beyinkutularından pek de moral düzeltecek raporlar gelmiyor. Burada gerçekuzayda bir elektekinden daha fazla delik var. Bütün sensörlerimiz uyarı veriyor. Sahirlik söz konusu olmalı Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, we have arrived in Phton IV's system. Our translation from the warp was a little rough — a net loss of about 500 souls on the middle and service decks, and God-Emperor only knows how many wounded. But that's only the half of it: the brainboxes on the augurs are sending me reports that aren't doing my mood any favours. Realspace here's got more holes than a sieve, and all our sensors are playing up — it's got to be sorcery, Lord Cap'n."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, Phton IV sistemine ulaştık. Öteboyuttan geçişimiz biraz sıkıntılı oldu, orta güvertede ve hizmet güvertelerinde yaklaşık 500 kişiyi net bir şekilde kaybettik ve kaç kişinin yaralandığını yalnızca Tanrı İmparator bilir. Hepsi bu kadar da değil: Alametlerdeki beyinkutularından gelen raporlar pek de moralimi düzeltebilecek şeyler değiller. Buradaki gerçekuzayda bir elektekinden daha fazla delik var ve bütün sensörlerimiz uyarı veriyor. Burada sahirlik olmalı Lord Kaptan."
